title: The Hardest Peace: Expecting Grace in the Midst of Life's Hard
description: Don’t miss  The Long The Kara Tippetts Story  on Netflix now, featuring Ann Voskamp, Ellie Holcomb, and Joanna Gaines!Kara Tippetts knows the ordinary days of mothering four kids, the joy of watching her children grow ... and the devestating reality of stage-four cancer. In The Hardest Peace , Kara doesn't offer answers for when living is hard, but she asks us to join her in moving away from fear and control and toward peace and grace. Most of all, she draws us back to the God who is with us, in the mundane and the suffering, and who shapes even our pain into beauty. Winner of the 2015 Christian Book Award® in the Inspiration category.
author: Kara Tippetts
